definition: a very dark sweet ale brewed from roasted unmalted barley, carry luggage or supplies
details:
noun
- a very dark sweet ale brewed from roasted unmalted barley
= synonyms: porter's beer
- someone who guards an entrance
= synonyms: doorkeeper, doorman, door guard, hall porter, gatekeeper, ostiary
- a railroad employee who assists passengers (especially on sleeping cars)
- a person employed to carry luggage and supplies
verb
- carry luggage or supplies
= example: carry luggage or supplies
